q: musical guest next Wednesday, Feb. 9. Elton John will chat with David Letterman on the Feb. 9 show, along with actor Ty Burrell . Leon Russell will then join Elton John , presumably to perform the GRAMMY-nominated song If It Wasn't For Bad. shift in leadership, Google co-founder Larry Page will take charge of the company's day-to-day operations as chief executive officer, replacing current CEO Eric Schmidt , who will focus on strategic projects, in particular new products. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement released by Google.`` By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company.
